querystring.select: SELECT ACCP.CONTACT_PERSON_NAME AS ContactPersonName, RMG.DESCR AS MrGenderDescr, ACCP.JOB_TITLE_NAME AS JobTitleName, RMJP.DESCR AS MrJobPositionDescr, RMIT.DESCR AS MrIdTypeDescr, ACCP.BIRTH_PLACE AS BirthPlace, ACCP.ID_NO AS IdNo, ACCP.BIRTH_DT AS BirthDt, ACCP.ID_EXPIRED_DT AS IdExipedDt, RMCR.DESCR AS MrCustRelationshipDescr, ACCP.MOBILE_PHN_NO_1 AS MobilePhone1, ACCP.MOBILE_PHN_NO_2 AS MobilePhone2, ACCP.EMAIL_1 AS Email1, ACCP.EMAIL_2 AS Email2
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP_CUST AC WITH ( NOLOCK ) JOIN dbo.APP_CUST_COMPANY ACP WITH (NOLOCK) ON AC.APP_CUST_ID=ACP.APP_CUST_ID JOIN dbo.APP_CUST_COMPANY_CONTACT_PERSON ACCP WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON ACP.APP_CUST_COMPANY_ID= ACCP.APP_CUST_COMPANY_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER RMG WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON ACCP.MR_GENDER_CODE = RMG.MASTER_CODE AND RMG.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE= 'GENDER' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER RMIT WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON AC.MR_ID_TYPE_CODE = RMIT.MASTER_CODE AND RMIT.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'ID_TYPE' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER RMJP WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON ACCP.MR_JOB_POSITION_CODE = RMJP.MASTER_CODE AND RMJP.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'JOB_POSITION' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER RMCR WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON ACCP.MR_CUST_RELATIONSHIP_CODE = RMCR.MASTER_CODE AND RMCR.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE IN ( 'CUST_PERSONAL_RELATIONSHIP', 'CUST_COMPANY_RELATIONSHIP' )
